events.name: Severe thunderstorms in Ontario and Quebec, May 2022
events.wd_label: Severe thunderstorms in Ontario and Quebec, May 2022
events.wd_description: Severe thunderstorms swept through Ontario and Central Quebec, causing widespread power outages, destruction of property, and leading to five deaths and several injuries.
events.description: Severe thunderstorms swept through Ontario and Central Quebec, causing widespread power outages, destruction of property, and leading to five deaths and several injuries.

events.name: Thunderstorms in Ontario
events.wd_description: Thunderstorms in Ontario, beginning in Sarnia and moving towards Ottawa, left more than 350,000 customers without power, caused widespread damage, and resulted in five deaths.
events.description: Thunderstorms in Ontario, beginning in Sarnia and moving towards Ottawa, left more than 350,000 customers without power, caused widespread damage, and resulted in five deaths.

events.name: Thunderstorms in Quebec
events.wd_description: Similar thunderstorms in Central Quebec left more than 500,000 homes without power, destroying homes, electricity lines, and trees.
events.description: Similar thunderstorms in Central Quebec left more than 500,000 homes without power, destroying homes, electricity lines, and trees.

events.name: Response and recovery efforts
events.wd_description: Crews were mobilized to restore power and services to the regions affected by the thunderstorms in Ontario and Quebec.
events.description: Crews were mobilized to restore power and services to the regions affected by the thunderstorms in Ontario and Quebec.

events.name: Ukraine's EU candidate status recommendation
events.wd_description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.
events.description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.

events.name: European Commission recommendation
events.wd_description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.
events.description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.

events.name: Moldova's candidate status
events.wd_description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.
events.description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.

events.name: Upcoming EU summit
events.wd_description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.
events.description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.
events.description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.

events.name: Severe flooding in southern China, June 2022
events.wd_label: Severe flooding in southern China, June 2022
events.wd_description: Tens of thousands of people were evacuated due to severe flooding in southern China, particularly affecting the Guangdong and Jiangxi provinces, with more rain expected and significant disruptions in daily life.
events.description: Tens of thousands of people were evacuated due to severe flooding in southern China, particularly affecting the Guangdong and Jiangxi provinces, with more rain expected and significant disruptions in daily life.

events.name: Flooding in Guangdong
events.wd_description: The flooding in Guangdong led to the suspension of classes, office work, and public transportation, with tens of thousands of people evacuated and widespread damage in Shaoguan, Heyuan, and Meizhou.
events.description: The flooding in Guangdong led to the suspension of classes, office work, and public transportation, with tens of thousands of people evacuated and widespread damage in Shaoguan, Heyuan, and Meizhou.

events.name: Impact on Jiangxi province
events.wd_description: In Jiangxi province, nearly 500,000 people have had their homes damaged and lives uprooted due to the flooding, with similar levels of impact as in Guangdong.
events.description: In Jiangxi province, nearly 500,000 people have had their homes damaged and lives uprooted due to the flooding, with similar levels of impact as in Guangdong.

events.name: Government response and historical context
events.wd_description: The government has invested heavily in flood control, including projects like the Three Gorges Dam, following the devastating floods of 1998, which resulted in over 2,000 deaths and the destruction of nearly 3 million homes.
events.description: The government has invested heavily in flood control, including projects like the Three Gorges Dam, following the devastating floods of 1998, which resulted in over 2,000 deaths and the destruction of nearly 3 million homes.

events.name: CATL Germany Factory Milestone
events.wd_description: CATL's first overseas factory in Thuringia, Germany, has obtained a license for cell production, marking a significant step in its global expansion.
events.description: CATL's first overseas factory in Thuringia, Germany, has obtained a license for cell production, marking a significant step in its global expansion.

events.name: License Issuance Ceremony
events.wd_description: During a celebration ceremony in the "Erfurt Crossroads" industrial area, Thuringia's ministers issued the second phase license for CATL's German factory, granting an 8GWh cell production capacity.
events.description: During a celebration ceremony in the "Erfurt Crossroads" industrial area, Thuringia's ministers issued the second phase license for CATL's German factory, granting an 8GWh cell production capacity.

events.name: Factory Overview
events.wd_description: CATL's German factory, which includes both purchased and newly built facilities, is in the equipment installation phase and aims to start production by the end of 2022.
events.description: CATL's German factory, which includes both purchased and newly built facilities, is in the equipment installation phase and aims to start production by the end of 2022.

events.name: t: G1 Facility
events.wd_description: The G1 facility involves assembling battery cells into modules in a purchased building.
events.description: The G1 facility involves assembling battery cells into modules in a purchased building.

events.name: t: G2 Facility
events.wd_description: The G2 facility, which received the cell production license, is a newly constructed building for cell production.
events.description: The G2 facility, which received the cell production license, is a newly constructed building for cell production.

events.name: Economic and Environmental Impact
events.wd_description: The factory represents one of the most significant industrial investments in Thuringia in decades, expected to create 1,500 jobs initially and a total of 2,000 jobs in the future, with part of its energy supplied by solar panels.
events.description: The factory represents one of the most significant industrial investments in Thuringia in decades, expected to create 1,500 jobs initially and a total of 2,000 jobs in the future, with part of its energy supplied by solar panels.

events.name: t: Job Creation
events.wd_description: The factory is expected to provide 1,500 jobs by the end of 2022 and a total of 2,000 jobs once fully operational.
events.description: The factory is expected to provide 1,500 jobs by the end of 2022 and a total of 2,000 jobs once fully operational.

events.name: t: Sustainable Energy Use
events.wd_description: To achieve sustainable battery production, part of the factory's energy will come from solar panels installed on the building's roof.
events.description: To achieve sustainable battery production, part of the factory's energy will come from solar panels installed on the building's roof.
